Package eg.edu.alexu.csd.datastructure.stack

Class ExpressionEvaluator

Object
ExpressionEvaluator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExpressionEvaluator
public class ExpressionEvaluator
extends Object
implements IExpressionEvaluator
this class is an evaluator that can convert from infix expression to postfix and evaluate the postfix expressions
Author:
Elmeniawy

  • Method Details

    • infixToPostfix

      public String infixToPostfix​(String expression)
      Description copied from interface: IExpressionEvaluator
      Takes a symbolic/numeric infix expression as input and converts it to postfix notation. There is no assumption on spaces between terms or the length of the term (e.g., two digits symbolic or numeric term)
      Specified by:
      infixToPostfix in interface IExpressionEvaluator
      Parameters:
      expression - infix expression
      Returns:
      postfix expression

    • evaluate

      public int evaluate​(String expression)
      Description copied from interface: IExpressionEvaluator
      Evaluate a postfix numeric expression, with a single space separator
      Specified by:
      evaluate in interface IExpressionEvaluator
      Parameters:
      expression - postfix expression
      Returns:
      the expression evaluated value

    • getWeight

      public int getWeight​(String s)
      Method to define the weight of the operator to define when the program will print operators
      Parameters:
      s - the part of the original expression
      Returns:
      the weight of operator or zero if it is not operator

    • Choose

      public int Choose​(String s)
      Method to define the operator or it is a number
      Parameters:
      s - the part of the original expression
      Returns:
      the number of operator, 1 if it is a number or 0 if it is an invalid input
